title: Maus0728
author: Maus0728
content: Heya, currently decluttering my email accounts due to spam and unwanted messages that forces me to change my email on my bitcointalk account for the sake of having a clean slate as well as security. This will also serve as a proof that this account wasn't hacked nor changed hands.Code:-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----This is Maus0728 from bitcointalk.org, today is 1st of August 2022.-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----Version: Bitcoin-qt (1.0)Address: 1G3UYV95L7PAMBgfmVZAeFQMqKrrWxfAnzIOwkZIPytid/VfsLqiGSXays8WEfTaEr5fc4c/eSjpIfDz9w8YDSpAJN59bdVaQ8tMc0EDGB4kE5/QQx+U1Plkk=-----END BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----The address was also staked almost 2.5 years ago: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=996318.msg53425606#msg53425606Regards,Maus0728

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on August 01, 2022, 10:35:30 AMHeya, currently decluttering my email accounts due to spam and unwanted messages that forces me to change my email on my bitcointalk account for the sake of having a clean slate as well as security. This will also serve as a proof that this account wasn't hacked nor changed hands.Code:-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----This is Maus0728 from bitcointalk.org, today is 1st of August 2022.-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----Version: Bitcoin-qt (1.0)Address: 1G3UYV95L7PAMBgfmVZAeFQMqKrrWxfAnzIOwkZIPytid/VfsLqiGSXays8WEfTaEr5fc4c/eSjpIfDz9w8YDSpAJN59bdVaQ8tMc0EDGB4kE5/QQx+U1Plkk=-----END BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----The address was also staked almost 2.5 years ago: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=996318.msg53425606#msg53425606Regards,Maus0728Quoted and verified.I think your topic belongs to Reputation, not Meta. It is personal thing for your personal account and is not related to forum issues.
